subject: Sales
title: MEDDIC: The Enterprise Framework
description: A quick, practical guide to MEDDIC: The Enterprise Framework.

hook.text: Enterprise deals die silently. MEDDIC was created at PTC to stop million-dollar deals from vanishing.

buildup.text: MEDDIC: Metrics, Economic Buyer, Decision Criteria, Process, Identify Pain, Champion. Six checkpoints.

discovery.text: Missing any element risks the deal. MEDDIC forces reps to qualify rigorously at every single stage.

twist.text: MEDDIC feels bureaucratic to reps who wing it. But unqualified pipelines waste far more precious time.

climax.text: Apply MEDDIC to every enterprise opportunity. It kills bad deals early and accelerates the good ones.

punchline.text: MEDDIC qualifies deals before they waste your time.

quiz.question: What does the 'C' in MEDDIC stand for?
